title: Knowledge Management and Collaboration Strategies for Corporate Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Organizational management, innovation theory, and experience with basic knowledge-sharing platforms
context.additional_context: Emphasis on real-time collaboration and self-directed knowledge exploration using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement communication strategies for knowledge creation within organizations
Learners can submit PBL outcomes that concretize innovative ideas by integrating multidisciplinary knowledge.
Learners can solve practical scenarios by utilizing self-directed navigation skills in a knowledge management system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
